titleSlide.subheading: Universal subscription management system for Telegram
titleSlide.description: One subscription to a private channel + bot opens up unlimited possibilities for subscribing to any Telegram object and not only:
titleSlide.description2:
- private/public groups
 - private/public channels
 - bots
 - subscription check after Telegram Login on any sites and services

problemsSlide.heading: ‚ùó What problems do we solve
problemsSlide.currentPainPoints: Current pain points of content creators:
problemsSlide.manualManagement:
Manual subscription management
Creators spend hours checking payments and managing access manually
problemsSlide.limitedPayments:
Limited payment methods
Most solutions do not support cryptocurrencies popular in the Telegram community
problemsSlide.noAnalytics:
Lack of analytics
No tools for conversion analysis and content strategy optimization
problemsSlide.highCommissions:
High commissions
Traditional payment systems take a large % commission
problemsSlide.solutionAutomation: 100% automation - From payment to access provision
problemsSlide.solutionCrypto: Cryptocurrency payments - TON, USDT (any token) with minimal commissions
problemsSlide.solutionAnalytics: Detailed analytics (soon) - A complete picture of your business
